verses.verse: In the seventh<WH7637> month, in the one<WH259> and twentieth<WH6242> day of the month<WH2320>, came the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> by<WH3027> the prophet<WH5030> Haggai<WH2292>, saying<WH559>,

Speak<WH559> now to Zerubbabel<WH2216> the son<WH1121> of Shealtiel<WH7597>, governor<WH6346> of Judah<WH3063>, and to Joshua<WH3091> the son<WH1121> of Josedech<WH3087>, the high<WH1419> priest<WH3548>, and to the residue<WH7611> of the people<WH5971>, saying<WH559>,

Who is left<WH7604> among you that saw<WH7200> this house<WH1004> in her first<WH7223> glory<WH3519>? and how do ye see<WH7200> it now? is it not in your eyes<WH5869> in comparison<WH3644> of it as nothing?

Yet now be strong<WH2388>, O Zerubbabel<WH2216>, saith<WH5002> the LORD<WH3068>; and be strong<WH2388>, O Joshua<WH3091>, son<WH1121> of Josedech<WH3087>, the high<WH1419> priest<WH3548>; and be strong<WH2388>, all ye people<WH5971> of the land<WH776>, saith<WH5002> the LORD<WH3068>, and work<WH6213>: for I am with you, saith<WH5002> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>:
According to the word<WH1697> that I covenanted<WH3772> with you when ye came<WH3318> out of Egypt<WH4714>, so my spirit<WH7307> remaineth<WH5975> among<WH8432> you: fear<WH3372> ye not.

For thus saith<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>; Yet once<WH259>, it is a little while<WH4592>, and I will shake<WH7493> the heavens<WH8064>, and the earth<WH776>, and the sea<WH3220>, and the dry<WH2724> land;

And I will shake<WH7493> all nations<WH1471>, and the desire<WH2532> of all nations<WH1471> shall come<WH935>: and I will fill<WH4390> this house<WH1004> with glory<WH3519>, saith<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>.
The silver<WH3701> is mine, and the gold<WH2091> is mine, saith<WH5002> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>.

The glory<WH3519> of this latter<WH314> house<WH1004> shall be greater than<WH1419> of the former<WH7223>, saith<WH5002> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>: and in this place<WH4725> will I give<WH5414> peace<WH7965>, saith<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>.

¶ In the four<WH702> and twentieth<WH6242> day of the ninth<WH8671> month, in the second<WH8147> year<WH8141> of Darius<WH1867>, came the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> by<WH3027> Haggai<WH2292> the prophet<WH5030>, saying<WH559>,
Thus saith<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>; Ask<WH7592> now the priests<WH3548> concerning the law<WH8451>, saying<WH559>,

If one<WH376> bear<WH5375> holy<WH6944> flesh<WH1320> in the skirt<WH3671> of his garment<WH899>, and with his skirt<WH3671> do touch<WH5060> bread<WH3899>, or pottage<WH5138>, or wine<WH3196>, or oil<WH8081>, or any meat<WH3978>, shall it be holy<WH6942>? And the priests<WH3548> answered<WH6030> and said<WH559>, No.

Then said<WH559> Haggai<WH2292>, If one that is unclean<WH2931> by a dead body<WH5315> touch<WH5060> any of these, shall it be unclean<WH2930>? And the priests<WH3548> answered<WH6030> and said<WH559>, It shall be unclean<WH2930>.

Then answered<WH6030> Haggai<WH2292>, and said<WH559>, So is this people<WH5971>, and so is this nation<WH1471> before<WH6440> me, saith<WH5002> the LORD<WH3068>; and so is every work<WH4639> of their hands<WH3027>; and that which they offer<WH7126> there is unclean<WH2931>.

And now, I pray you, consider<WH7760><WH3824> from this day<WH3117> and upward<WH4605>, from before<WH2962> a stone<WH68> was laid<WH7760> upon a stone<WH68> in the temple<WH1964> of the LORD<WH3068>:

Since those days were, when one came<WH935> to an heap<WH6194> of twenty<WH6242> measures, there were but ten<WH6235>: when one came<WH935> to the pressfat<WH3342> for to draw out<WH2834> fifty<WH2572> vessels out of the press<WH6333>, there were but twenty<WH6242>.
I smote<WH5221> you with blasting<WH7711> and with mildew<WH3420> and with hail<WH1259> in all the labours<WH4639> of your hands<WH3027>; yet ye turned not to me, saith<WH5002> the LORD<WH3068>.

Consider<WH7760><WH3824> now from this day<WH3117> and upward<WH4605>, from the four<WH702> and twentieth<WH6242> day<WH3117> of the ninth<WH8671> month, even from the day<WH3117> that the foundation<WH3245> of the LORD's<WH3068> temple<WH1964> was laid, consider<WH7760><WH3824> it.

Is the seed<WH2233> yet in the barn<WH4035>? yea, as yet the vine<WH1612>, and the fig tree<WH8384>, and the pomegranate<WH7416>, and the olive<WH2132> tree<WH6086>, hath not brought forth<WH5375>: from this day<WH3117> will I bless<WH1288> you.
¶ And again<WH8145> the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> came unto Haggai<WH2292> in the four<WH702> and twentieth<WH6242> day of the month<WH2320>, saying<WH559>,
Speak<WH559> to Zerubbabel<WH2216>, governor<WH6346> of Judah<WH3063>, saying<WH559>, I will shake<WH7493> the heavens<WH8064> and the earth<WH776>;

And I will overthrow<WH2015> the throne<WH3678> of kingdoms<WH4467>, and I will destroy<WH8045> the strength<WH2392> of the kingdoms<WH4467> of the heathen<WH1471>; and I will overthrow<WH2015> the chariots<WH4818>, and those that ride<WH7392> in them; and the horses<WH5483> and their riders<WH7392> shall come down<WH3381>, every one<WH376> by the sword<WH2719> of his brother<WH251>.

In that day<WH3117>, saith<WH5002> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>, will I take<WH3947> thee, O Zerubbabel<WH2216>, my servant<WH5650>, the son<WH1121> of Shealtiel<WH7597>, saith<WH5002> the LORD<WH3068>, and will make<WH7760> thee as a signet<WH2368>: for I have chosen<WH977> thee, saith<WH5002> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>.
